title: can someone delete this account maybe a league administrator or someone in charge like rito o 3 o
body: i want this account to be terminated or gone for good so I can reuse name or create another club with same name or tag

replies.body:
In order to delete an account, you'll have to reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our specialists can help you out.

Let me know if you have any questions.
